caption:
Exchanging gifts fosters a spirit of generosity and compassion this month of reflection, bringing families and loved ones closer.

Strengthen the bonds of faith and friendship with the beautifully curated Aidilfitri Platinum Hamper, filled with traditional flavours and delightful treats.

Aidilfitri Platinum Hamper at RM 1,288 nett.

Exclusively for Shangri-La Circle members:
✨ Enjoy a 10% discount by applying the promo code ‘SLCRAYA10’ at Shangri-La Boutique until 30 April 2024. T&Cs apply.
